peaceWithMoney.title: Course for Traders: PEACE WITH MONEY
peaceWithMoney.subtitle: 21 days to transform your relationship with money
peaceWithMoney.description: What if your real winning strategy was to HEAL your relationship with money?
peaceWithMoney.mainDescription: It's not your trading system that's holding you back, it's your emotional, mental and energetic bond with money. In 21 days you'll get the keys to transform that relationship and build a solid foundation for sustainable results.
peaceWithMoney.startTransformation: I want to start the inner change

peaceWithMoney.whyStruggles: Why do you still have ups and downs even though you master technical analysis?
peaceWithMoney.strugglesAnswer: Because money activates your deepest fears. Because the relationship you have with it defines how you attract it, sustain it or lose it. Changing that relationship changes your results.
peaceWithMoney.instructorBio: Jorge Lázaro León 👨‍🏫✍️ is a writer, therapist and coach specialized in personal and energetic transformation. His approach integrates tools of consciousness, energy and inner reprogramming to help you live money from worthiness and peace.
peaceWithMoney.bonusDescription: When you enroll, you can download the e-book "The definitive guide to living peace with money" for free.
peaceWithMoney.readyToTransform: Ready to transform your relationship with money?
peaceWithMoney.startJourney: Start your 21-day journey to financial peace
